definition: Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
Baiyun district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou/Baiyun district of Guangzhou city 廣州市|广州市[Guang3 zhou1 shi4], Guangdong
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world

sentences.english: The bright surfaces of clouds and snow are revealed by moonlight.
sentences.chinese: 月光照映出明亮的白雲和積雪。

sentences.english: Without a little utilitarian, to see white clouds dotted blue screen.
sentences.chinese: 不帶一點功利地，看白雲點綴藍幕。

sentences.english: On high the great white clouds slid swiftly.
sentences.chinese: 大片大片的白雲在高空飄過。

sentences.english: So lange as it is sunny, there are always white clouds in the blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 在慕尼黑，只要天晴的時候，總是能夠看見藍天白雲。

sentences.english: The tears are just like raindrops.
sentences.chinese: 嘩啦啦，小白雲的眼淚像雨點。

sentences.english: Behind is the bright blue and light of a cloud-scudded sky.
sentences.chinese: 湛藍色的天空飄着片片白雲。

sentences.english: Original, bai Yunchang is to infiltrate the army all information of especially high tax member.
sentences.chinese: 原來，白雲裳是打入特高課的軍統情報員。

sentences.english: If white clouds can change into a bridge, I will go to watch the moon.
sentences.chinese: 如果白雲能變成一張橋，我就能去看月亮。

sentences.english: About an hour later, I arrived at the White Cloud Airport in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 大約一小時後，我來到了廣州白雲機場。

sentences.english: Light as a breeze, soft as a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 輕盈如微風，柔軟似白雲。

sentences.english: The torch arrived at the Guangzhou airport on Tuesday before dark.
sentences.chinese: 星期二天黑前，火炬抵達廣州白雲機場。

sentences.english: In the blue the sky the white cloud is hovering.
sentences.chinese: 藍藍的天上，白雲在飛翔。

sentences.english: Once there were blue skies, with white clouds high above.
sentences.chinese: 曾經，這兒有藍天，白雲高高懸掛。

sentences.english: The sun has his simple rode of light. The clouds are decked with gorgeousness.
sentences.chinese: 太陽只穿一件樸素的光衣，白雲卻披了燦爛的裙裾。

sentences.english: The favorable reservoir in Cambrian stratum is dolostone of Sansanzi formation.
sentences.chinese: 盆地西緣寒武系有利儲層主要爲三山子組白雲岩儲層。

sentences.english: The dolomitization is the base of forming high quality reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 白雲石化作用是形成優質儲層的基礎。
